name: Neuhausr.GitHub.io-colorblind-friendly-carto
body:
Colorblindness was pretty theoretical for me until I played Qwirkle with a friend.
![qwirkle](http://boardgamegeek.com/image/1313564/qwirkle)
Turns out he is colorblind, and couldn't differentiate between some of these colors.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
